get.description: Retrieve nearest airports by geo coordinates (latitude/longitude).

parameters.description: Latitude in decimals, lower than -90.0 and higher than 90.0 is not allowed.
parameters.name: latitude

parameters.description: Longitude in decimals, lower than -180.0 and higher than 180.0 is not allowed.
parameters.name: longitude

parameters.description: Maximum distance in kilometers, lower than 1 and higher than 500 is not allowed. If not set, max value is applied.
parameters.name: maxDistanceInKm

parameters.description: Limits the result, lower than 0 is not allowed. If not set, the result is not limited.
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Retrieve nearest airports by station id.

parameters.description: Airport (IATA code) to search nearest airports for.
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Maximum distance in kilometers, lower than 1 and higher than 500 is not allowed. If not set, max value is applied.
parameters.name: maxDistanceInKm

parameters.description: Limits the result, lower than 0 is not allowed. If not set, the result is not limited.
parameters.name: limit
